item.title: Clarification on the Personal Blockchain
item.description: This is an archived post from the bitcointalks thread on May 06 2014 Quote from: FrictionlessCoin on May 06, 2014, 01:08:09 PM I still however am have trouble understanding how the protocol works and this notion of ‘personal blockchains’. Can you point me to the documentation that describes this better? For a personal blockchain, you generate a public key. To be valid you have to sign each block with your private key.
